name: All or Nothing Coin
description: Once per day, instead of rolling a d20, you can flip a coin. Heads = critical hit; Tails = critical fail.

name: All or Nothing Coin II
description: Once per day, instead of rolling a d20, you can flip a coin. Heads = critical hit; Tails = critical fail.
